remarks: Lemma for ~ poseq and ~ soseq .  The function value of a sequene is either in ` A ` or null.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
orderseqlem.1 $e |- F = { f | E. x e. On f : x --> A } $.
orderseqlem $p |- ( G e. F -> ( G ` X ) e. ( A u. { (/) } ) ) $.
$d A f x $.
$d G f x $.
$d X x $.
